name: Goocal
additional_info:
This style is fully working only with the script https://greasyfork.org/fr/scripts/10742-google-calendar-restyled
1) please, installtampermonkey (google chrome) or greasemonkey (firefox) first;
2) go to https://greasyfork.org/fr/scripts/10742-google-calendar-restyled and install the script

That's it.
